channel.title: [Faction Suggestion] Vampire Faction
channel.description:
[quote] <big>[color=DarkGrey]**Darcula**[/color]</big>
[color=DarkGrey]**Vampire Special**[/color]
**Vampiric (Passive)** - If you and your [color=darkgrey]**Ghoul**[/color] both dead, a random [color=darkgrey]**Vampire**[/color] will become the [color=darkgrey]**Vampire Leader**[/color]. Additionally, only you and your [color=darkgrey]**Ghoul**[/color] can communicate at night, other [color=darkgrey]**Vampire**[/color] can hear you, but they wont be able to talk.
**Harden Skin (Passive)** - Death and bleed immune. Occupy and redirection immune, but its hidden to other.
**Blood Ritual (Day)** - Promote a [color=darkgrey]**Vampire**[/color] to [color=darkgrey]**Ghoul**[/color]. Only usable after [color=darkgrey]**Ghoul**[/color] death. [1 Use]
**Bitten (Night)** - Convert a player to [color=darkgrey]**Vampire**[/color], they will keep their ability. They will appear as old class if killed at night and as [color=darkgrey]**Vampire**[/color] if be executed by [color=blue]**Prince**[/color] or during the day. No member limits. [1-Night Cooldown]
**Night Vision (Night)** - Follow a player and see who they visited and who visited them. [1-Night Cooldown] [/quote]
[quote] <big>[color=DarkGrey]**Ghoul**[/color]</big>
[color=DarkGrey]**Vampire Killer**[/color]
**Vampiric (Passive)** - If you and your [color=darkgrey]**Darcula**[/color] both dead, a random [color=darkgrey]**Vampire**[/color] will become the [color=darkgrey]**Vampire Leader**[/color]. Additionally, only you and your [color=darkgrey]**Darcula**[/color] can communicate at night, other [color=darkgrey]**Vampire**[/color] can hear you, but they wont be able to talk.
**Vampire Curse (Day)** - Bleed a player, they will die in 2 nights. [2 Use]
**Violent Bite (Night)** - Attack a player, killing them. [Infinite Use]
**Vampiric Ritual (Night)** - Sacrifice a [color=darkgrey]**Vampire**[/color], they will appear as their BD class, making [color=darkgrey]**Darcula**[/color] ability tonight wont take cooldown and give another use of **Vampire Curse**.[1-Night Cooldown] [/quote]
[quote] <big>[color=DarkGrey]**Vampire Leader**[/color]</big>
[color=DarkGrey]**Vampire Special**[/color]
**The Last Blood (Passive)** - As you present, the newest [color=darkgrey]**Vampire**[/color] that alive will die every night, you will die if there are no [color=darkgrey]**Vampire**[/color] left. And all [color=darkgrey]**Vampire**[/color] will die the same night you dead.
**Boiling (Passive)** - Immune to occupy and redirection.
**Blood Drain (Day)** - Bleed a player, they will die in 2 days. [2 Use]
**Painful Strike (Night)** - Command a [color=darkgrey]**Vampire**[/color] to attack a player. Bypass death immunity. [Infinite Use]
**Deadly Strike (Night)** - Attack 2 players yourself. [1 Use] [/quote]
(Need suggestion on should i make all converted turn into [color=darkgrey]**Vampire**[/color] or let they keeping old ability.)

item.title: [Faction Suggestion] Vampire Faction
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
First off, get rid of the vampire dying if the faction leader is still alive. IMO, Dracula should stay being occupy immune however I don’t think they should be death immune. Honestly, we should probably go for a mix of cult and unseen however we don’t want to cross it. We should also get rid of the ghoul and just make it so there’s the killer of it. Make there be a replacement system as well and get rid of the killer occupy immunity as well. So example, the game would start off with a Dracula And then the killer. If the Dracula died, the leader becomes Dracula and then whoever they convert become the leader.

We should nerf the killer of this class by making its killing Ability occupy the person they attack, however it delays the attack by one night. (Occupy the person you want dead N1 and they die N2)

Read full topic

item.title: [Faction Suggestion] Vampire Faction
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Bad idea. You should expect the Dracula to die in almost every game and balance accordingly.

In fact you also need to make sure the vampires aren’t screwed if he dies immediately to like a poss into knight or a lucky maid or something
